verses.verse: וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> unto me Son אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> of man עֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רַגְלֶ֔יךָ <S%H7272><s%> upon thy feet וַאֲדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> and I will speak אֹתָֽךְ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַתָּ֧בֹא <S%H935><s%> entered בִ֣י ר֗וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> And the spirit כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> he דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> into me when he spake אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about וַתַּעֲמִדֵ֖נִי <S%H5975><s%> unto me and set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רַגְלָ֑י <S%H7272><s%> me upon my feet וָאֶשְׁמַ֕ע <S%H8085><s%> that I heard אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מִדַּבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> him that spake אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> unto me Son אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> of man שׁוֹלֵ֨חַ <S%H7971><s%> I send אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I אֽוֹתְךָ֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> thee to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about גּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> nation הַמּוֹרְדִ֖ים <S%H4775><s%> to a rebellious אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who מָרְדוּ־ <S%H4775><s%> that hath rebelled בִ֑י הֵ֤מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they וַאֲבוֹתָם֙ <S%H1><s%> against me they and their fathers פָּ֣שְׁעוּ <S%H6586><s%> have transgressed בִ֔י עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against עֶ֖צֶם <S%H6106><s%> against me [even] unto this very הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

וְהַבָּנִ֗ים <S%H1121><s%> children קְשֵׁ֤י <S%H7186><s%> churlish פָנִים֙ <S%H6440><s%> accept וְחִזְקֵי־ <S%H2389><s%> harder לֵ֔ב <S%H3820><s%> care for אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I am שׁוֹלֵ֥חַ <S%H7971><s%> I do send אוֹתְךָ֖ <S%H853><s%> אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> and וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> thee unto them and thou shalt say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

וְהֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> them אִם־ <S%H518><s%> whether יִשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> And they whether they will hear וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> or יֶחְדָּ֔לוּ <S%H2308><s%> or whether they will forbear כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house מְרִ֖י <S%H4805><s%> (for they [are] a rebellious הֵ֑מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like וְיָ֣דְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> acknowledge כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that נָבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> that there hath been a prophet הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> has been בְתוֹכָֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> among פ

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> and you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> And thou son אָ֠דָם <S%H120><s%> of man אַל־ <S%H408><s%> neither תִּירָ֨א <S%H3372><s%> be not afraid מֵהֶ֜ם <S%H1992><s%> like וּמִדִּבְרֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H1697><s%> of their words אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תִּירָ֗א <S%H3372><s%> of them neither be afraid כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> though סָרָבִ֤ים <S%H5621><s%> though briers וְסַלּוֹנִים֙ <S%H5544><s%> and thorns אוֹתָ֔ךְ <S%H854><s%> for וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on עַקְרַבִּ֖ים <S%H6137><s%> among scorpions אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> and you יוֹשֵׁ֑ב <S%H3427><s%> [be] with thee and thou dost dwell מִדִּבְרֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H1697><s%> of their words אַל־ <S%H408><s%> neither תִּירָא֙ <S%H3372><s%> be not afraid וּמִפְּנֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H6440><s%> at their looks אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תֵּחָ֔ת <S%H2865><s%> nor be dismayed כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> though בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house מְרִ֖י <S%H4805><s%> though they [be] a rebellious הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> you

וְדִבַּרְתָּ֤ <S%H1696><s%> And thou shalt speak אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרַי֙ <S%H1697><s%> my words אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> whether יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> unto them whether they will hear וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> or יֶחְדָּ֑לוּ <S%H2308><s%> or whether they will forbear כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for מְרִ֖י <S%H4805><s%> for they [are] most rebellious הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> like פ

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> now you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> But thou son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man שְׁמַע֙ <S%H8085><s%> hear אֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> to what אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I am מְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> what I say אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> unto thee Be not מֶ֖רִי <S%H4805><s%> thou rebellious כְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֑רִי <S%H4805><s%> like that rebellious פְּצֵ֣ה <S%H6475><s%> open פִ֔יךָ <S%H6310><s%> thy mouth וֶאֱכֹ֕ל <S%H398><s%> and eat אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> that I give אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> then

וָאֶרְאֶ֕ה <S%H7200><s%> And when I looked וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold יָ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> behold an hand שְׁלוּחָ֣ה <S%H7971><s%> [was] sent אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> lo ב֖וֹ מְגִלַּת־ <S%H4039><s%> unto me and lo a roll סֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H5612><s%> of a book

וַיִּפְרֹ֤שׂ <S%H6566><s%> And he spread אוֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> לְפָנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> it before וְהִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> it was כְתוּבָ֖ה <S%H3789><s%> me and it [was] written פָּנִ֣ים <S%H6440><s%> within וְאָח֑וֹר <S%H268><s%> and without וְכָת֣וּב <S%H3789><s%> and [there was] written אֵלֶ֔יהָ <S%H413><s%> on קִנִ֥ים <S%H7015><s%> therein lamentations וָהֶ֖גֶה <S%H1899><s%> and mourning וָהִֽי׃ <S%H1958><s%> and woe ס
